metadata.synopsis: One-node dialog for the guard at the House of Grief. The guard presents herself as an usher/greeter for the House of Grief - outwardly friendly and welcoming, while in truth acting as sentry.
metadata.how_to_trigger: 1. Go to the House of Grief in LOW2. Talk to the guard

0.speaker: Griefguard Afara
0.text: Please, do not delay. Contentment is within your grasp - just step inside, with an open mind.

1.speaker: Griefguard Afara
1.text: Welcome, the House of Grief lies just within. We are here to help.

2.speaker: Griefguard Afara
2.text: I always knew you were destined for greatness, my lady. It is my great shame that I never voiced it sooner.
2.context: NodeContext: Grovelling, Speaking to her one-time peer turned boss.

3.speaker: Griefguard Afara
3.text: Waste no more time out here. You have much to explain within.

4.speaker: Griefguard Afara
4.text: My Lady... it is true then. You are now the Nightsinger's chosen. Long may you rule.
4.context: NodeContext: Grovelling, Speaking to her one-time peer turned boss.

5.speaker: Griefguard Afara
5.text: So it's true... you have prevailed. I want no trouble - only a fool would seek to share in the Mother Superior's fate.
5.context: NodeContext: Peacemaking. Henchwoman left unscathed after her boss has been defeated

6.speaker: Griefguard Afara
6.text: Perhaps it would be wise to leave matters there. No need for more bloodshed.
6.context: NodeContext: Peacemaking. Henchwoman left unscathed after her boss has been defeated

7.speaker: Griefguard Afara
7.text: You. Enter at once. She has been awaiting you.
